summary: Pre-sale import UI fixes - All 4 critical bugs verified FIXED. Backend 8/8 tests passed, Frontend UI all features working correctly.
passed_tests: Order Detail Dialog shows Code column (MAT-5A, ENG-5B)
Order Detail Dialog shows Price column ($25.50, $18.75)
Order Detail Dialog shows Qty column (x1, x2)
Order Detail Dialog shows Print button at bottom
Orders table shows Student, User, Grade, Items, Total, Date, Status, Actions columns
Bulk selection shows BulkActionBar with Archive, Delete, Package List buttons
API: Orders have items with book_code field
API: Orders have items with price field
API: Orders have items with quantity_ordered field
API: Print jobs endpoint works with order_ids

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Bug 1: Imported presale orders from Monday.com lack item prices and total
bugs_verified_fixed.evidence: Order items have price (25.5, 18.75) and total_amount (63.0)

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Bug 2: Print button missing from order detail dialog
bugs_verified_fixed.evidence: Print button visible in DialogFooter with printer icon

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Bug 3: Book code column missing from order view
bugs_verified_fixed.evidence: Code column shows MAT-5A, ENG-5B in order detail dialog

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Bug 4: Bulk print option not visible on orders table
bugs_verified_fixed.evidence: BulkActionBar shows Package List button when items selected

seed_data_creation: Test order created with student_name='Test Student', grade='5', 2 items (MAT-5A $25.50 x1, ENG-5B $18.75 x2), total=$63.00
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pre-sale import UI fixes verified. Order Detail Dialog at ~line 615 in TextbookOrdersAdminTab.jsx shows Code, Book, Price, Qty columns + Print button. BulkActionBar at ~line 768 shows when items selected with Archive, Delete, Package List buttons. Backend presale_import_service.py correctly parses price from both text and value fields in Monday.com subitem column_values.
